entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `guid` TEXT NOT NULL, `chat_identifier` TEXT, `display_name` TEXT, `is_pinned` INTEGER NOT NULL, `pin_index` INTEGER, `is_archived` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_starred` INTEGER NOT NULL, `mute_type` TEXT, `mute_args` TEXT, `has_unread_message` INTEGER NOT NULL, `unread_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `style` INTEGER, `is_group` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_message_text` TEXT, `last_message_date` INTEGER, `custom_avatar_path` TEXT, `custom_notification_sound` TEXT, `notifications_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `notification_priority` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default', `bubble_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `pop_on_screen` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `lock_screen_visibility` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'all', `show_notification_dot` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `vibration_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `snooze_until` INTEGER, `auto_send_read_receipts` INTEGER, `auto_send_typing_indicators` INTEGER, `text_field_text` TEXT, `lock_chat_name` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lock_chat_icon` INTEGER NOT NULL, `latest_message_date` INTEGER, `date_created` INTEGER NOT NULL, `date_deleted` INTEGER, `is_sms_fallback` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `fallback_reason` TEXT, `fallback_updated_at` INTEGER, `is_spam` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `spam_score` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `spam_reported_to_carrier` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `category` TEXT, `category_confidence` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `category_last_updated` INTEGER, `preferred_send_mode` TEXT, `send_mode_manually_set` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0)
